item.title: #065 â€“ UX or UI, know the difference?
item.description: Delighted to be joined by Product Designer, Nina Goluskin, in this episode to shed some light on the differences between UX and UI. They are often lumped together, in media coverage and even job postings, as a combined concept, but the truth is they require completely different skill and experience to execute properly.
